content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; img-src *; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://sentry.numops.com https://cloudflare-dns.com https://api.numserver.com https://modules.numprotocol.com https://data.companieshouse.gov.uk https://unpkg.com; script-src-elem 'self' blob: https://unpkg.com
